mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STUDYGROUP ( SG_NO, SG_NAME, SG_GOAL, SG_CONTENT, SG_OWNER_NICK, SG_MAX, SG_CURRENT, SG_CATEGORY, SG_LOCATION ) VALUES ( SEQ_SG_NO.NEXTVAL, #{sgName}, #{sgGoal}, #{sgContent}, #{sgOwnerNick}, #{sgMax}, DEFAULT, #{sgCategory}, #{sgLocation} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STUDYGROUP WHERE SG_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM STUDYGROUP WHERE SG_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY SG_ENROLLDATE DESC
SELECT * FROM STUDYGROUP WHERE ((SG_MAX - 1) = SG_CURRENT) ORDER BY SG_ENROLLDATE DESC
SELECT SG_NO FROM STUDYGROUP WHERE SG_NAME = #{sgName}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STUDYGROUP WHERE SG_NAME LIKE '%'||#{searchContent}||'%' OR SG_GOAL LIKE '%'||#{searchContent}||'%' OR SG_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{searchContent}||'%' OR SG_CATEGORY LIKE '%'||#{searchContent}||'%' ORDER BY SG_ENROLLDATE DESC

SELECT * FROM STUDYGROUP WHERE SG_NAME LIKE '%'||#{searchContent}||'%' OR SG_GOAL LIKE '%'||#{searchContent}||'%' OR SG_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{searchContent}||'%' OR SG_CATEGORY LIKE '%'||#{searchContent}||'%' ORDER BY SG_ENROLLDATE DESC
SELECT SG_MAX FROM STUDYGROUP WHERE SG_NO = #{sgNo}
SELECT * FROM STUDYGROUP WHERE SG_NO IN (SELECT SGM_SG_NO FROM STUDYGROUPMEMBER WHERE SGM_NICK = #{userNick}) ORDER BY SG_ENROLLDATE DESC
